caption.p: Schematic representation of lung alveolar in presence of normal homeostasis (left) characterized by a balanced ACE1/ACE2 pathway, and during SARS-CoV-2 infection condition (right) in which SARS-CoV-2 mediated suppression of ACE2 receptor causes ACE1/ACE2 unbalance responsible for RAS over-activation and pulmonary shut-down.
